generate_deadlines_and_job_list.py File Reference

Go to the source code of this file.

Namespaces

 generate_deadlines_and_job_list
 This file generates a csv file with the deadlines for each snippet, following the specified thresholds, and it generates a job_list with a list of snippets (defined by num_snippets).
 

Functions

def generate_deadlines_and_job_list.generate_bursts (burst_size, gap_size)
 Create high-temperature bursts based on the given parameters, i.e., creates sequences of snippets that have a high temperature profile. More...
